name: ESL Games Collection
description: This is a compilation of all the mini games I created for my ESL classes in China. There are 14 games in total. It uses words from Kid's Beginner A and B books.  Some of the games were intended to be played by groups of children in a classroom setting, therefore they may not make sense in this context. This was created to work in windows as an .EXE and never in the browser. Some bugs and unintended behavior will be present. This is mainly for my website to show some of my past work.
